verses.verse: For Zion's sake <S%H4616><s%> I will not keep <S%H2814><s%> silent, <S%H2814><s%> And for Jerusalem's sake <S%H4616><s%> I will not keep <S%H8252><s%> quiet, <S%H8252><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> her righteousness <S%H6664><s%> goes <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> like brightness, <S%H5051><s%> And her salvation <S%H3444><s%> like a torch <S%H3940><s%> that is burning. <S%H1197><s%>

And the nations <S%H1471><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> your righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> your glory; <S%H9202><s%> And you will be called <S%H7121><s%> by a new <S%H2319><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will designate. <S%H9344><s%>

You will also be a crown <S%H5850><s%> of beauty <S%H8597><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And a royal <S%H4410><s%> diadem <S%H6797><s%> in the hand <S%H3709><s%> of your God. <S%H430><s%>

It will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be said <S%H559><s%> to you, "Forsaken, <S%H5800><s%>" Nor <S%H3808><s%> to your land <S%H776><s%> will it any <S%H5750><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be said, <S%H559><s%> "Desolate <S%H8077><s%>"; But you will be called, <S%H7121><s%> "My delight <S%H2656><s%> is in her," And your land, <S%H776><s%> "Married <S%H1166><s%>"; For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> delights <S%H2654><s%> in you, And [to Him] your land <S%H776><s%> will be married. <S%H1166><s%>

For [as] a young <S%H970><s%> man <S%H970><s%> marries <S%H1166><s%> a virgin, <S%H1330><s%> [So] your sons <S%H1121><s%> will marry <S%H1166><s%> you; And [as] the bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> rejoices <S%H4885><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the bride, <S%H3618><s%> [So] your God <S%H430><s%> will rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you.

On your walls, <S%H2346><s%> O Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> I have appointed <S%H6485><s%> watchmen; <S%H8104><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> they will never <S%H3808><s%> keep <S%H2814><s%> silent. <S%H2814><s%> You who remind <S%H2142><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> take no <S%H408><s%> rest <S%H1824><s%> for yourselves;

And give <S%H5414><s%> Him no <S%H408><s%> rest <S%H1824><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> He establishes <S%H3559><s%> And makes <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a praise <S%H8416><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%> by His right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> and by His strong <S%H5797><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> "I will never <S%H518><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> your grain <S%H1715><s%> [as] food <S%H3978><s%> for your enemies; <S%H340><s%> Nor <S%H518><s%> will foreigners <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> your new <S%H8492><s%> wine, <S%H8492><s%> for which <S%H834><s%> you have labored. <S%H3021><s%>"

But those who garner <S%H622><s%> it will eat <S%H398><s%> it, and praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> And those who gather <S%H6908><s%> it will drink <S%H8354><s%> it in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of My sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>

Go <S%H5674><s%> through, <S%H5674><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> the gates; <S%H8179><s%> Clear <S%H6437><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> for the people; <S%H5971><s%> Build <S%H5549><s%> up, build <S%H5549><s%> up the highway; <S%H4546><s%> Remove <S%H5619><s%> the stones, <S%H68><s%> lift <S%H7311><s%> up a standard <S%H5251><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has proclaimed <S%H8085><s%> to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> Say <S%H559><s%> to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> "Lo, <S%H2009><s%> your salvation <S%H3468><s%> comes; <S%H935><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> His reward <S%H7939><s%> is with Him, and His recompense <S%H6468><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him."

And they will call <S%H7121><s%> them, "The holy <S%H6944><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> The redeemed <S%H1350><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>"; And you will be called, <S%H7121><s%> "Sought <S%H1875><s%> out, a city <S%H5892><s%> not forsaken. <S%H5800><s%>"
